薎字的基本解释

薎
miè
古同“蔑”。

薎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miè］
［《字彙補》音滅］
(1)见“薎蒙”。
(2)同“蔑”。

薎字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薎； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1061第03
【字彙】同蠛。【史記·司馬相如傳】薎蠓踴躍。　又【字彙補】細也。【馬融·長笛賦】蹉纖根，跋薎縷。　又與蔑同。【柳宗元·乞兩河效用狀】薎爾小醜，尚欲逋誅。　又人名。【山海經】女祭女薎。

薎字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
薎字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　薎; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1061 Page 03
【Vocabulary】Same as worm. 【Historical Records · Sima Xiangru Biography】The midges are active.　[Words complement] Fine also. 【Ma Rong·Flute Fu】The roots are slender and the roots are stubble.　The same with Mii again. 【Liu Zongyuan·Begging for Two Rivers Effect】Xiao'er clown, still wanting to punish.　Another name. 【Shan Hai Jing】The female priestess yue.
